description.fr_FR: Plugin Jeedom servant à contrôler le pilote de led adressables WLED (voir https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED et https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED/wiki)
description.en_US: Jeedom plugin to with the WLED digital led controller (see https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED and https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED/wiki)
description.es_ES: Plugin Jeedom para controlar los LEDs direccionables WLED (ver https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED y https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED/wiki)
description.de_DE: Jeedom-Plugin, das dazu dient, den Treiber für adressierbare WLEDs zu steuern (siehe https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED und https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED/wiki)
description.it_IT: Plugin Jeedom per il controllo dei LED indirizzabili WLED (vedi https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED e https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED/wiki)
description.pt_PT: Plugin Jeedom para controlar LEDs endereçáveis WLED (ver https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED e https://github.com/Aircoookie/WLED/wiki)
